think_procedure: First, I read the description of the knob. I noticed that the knob 'max_wal_senders' has a special value of 0 which changes the function of the knob. Normally, this knob specifies the maximum number of concurrent connections from standby servers or streaming base backup clients. However, when set to 0, it disables replication. This change in function based on a special value indicates that this is a 'special' numerical knob.
